languages.text: "Ваши цвета наливаются свинцом, когда вы рассуждаете о картинах. Не утруждайтесь, проктор. Искусство просто... не для вас".
"Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."
languages.original_text: "Ваши цвета наливаются свинцом, когда вы рассуждаете о картинах. Не утруждайтесь, проктор. Искусство просто... не для вас".

traits.locale_text: "Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."
"Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."
"Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."
"Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."
"Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."

languages.text: 「あなたがあたくしの絵の話をするとき、色彩がまるで鉛のように沈んで見えるわ。お気になさらないでください、代理人さん。ただ…芸術が、あなたのためのものではないというだけですから」
languages.original_text: "Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがあたくしの絵の話をするとき、色彩がまるで鉛のように沈んで見えるわ。お気になさらないでください、代理人さん。ただ…芸術が、あなたのためのものではないというだけですから」

languages.text: "Eure Farben werden bleiern, wenn Ihr von meinen Gemälden sprecht. Spart Euch die Mühe, Proktor. Kunst ist einfach ... nichts für Euch."
languages.original_text: "Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Farben werden bleiern, wenn Ihr von meinen Gemälden sprecht. Spart Euch die Mühe, Proktor. Kunst ist einfach ... nichts für Euch."

languages.text: « Vos couleurs prennent la teinte du plomb lorsque vous parlez de mes tableaux. Ne vous en souciez pas, proctor. L'art... n'est tout simplement pas fait pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."

traits.locale_text: « Vos couleurs prennent la teinte du plomb lorsque vous parlez de mes tableaux. Ne vous en souciez pas, proctor. L'art... n'est tout simplement pas fait pour vous. »

languages.text: «Sus colores se tornan cenicientos cuando habla sobre mis pinturas. No se atribule, Procurador. El arte... simplemente no es para usted».
languages.original_text: "Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."

traits.locale_text: «Sus colores se tornan cenicientos cuando habla sobre mis pinturas. No se atribule, Procurador. El arte... simplemente no es para usted».

languages.text: “当你谈论我的画时，你的颜色也变得阴沉下来。还是别自寻烦恼了吧，监察官，艺术……真的不适合你。”
languages.original_text: "Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."

traits.locale_text: “当你谈论我的画时，你的颜色也变得阴沉下来。还是别自寻烦恼了吧，监察官，艺术……真的不适合你。”

languages.text: "Resimlerimi anınca rengin grileşti. Kendini zorlama Üsteğmen. Sanat sana göre değil."
languages.original_text: "Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."

traits.locale_text: "Resimlerimi anınca rengin grileşti. Kendini zorlama Üsteğmen. Sanat, sana göre değil."

languages.original_text: "Your colours turn leaden when you talk about my paintings. Do not trouble yourself, Proctor. Art is simply... not for you."
